name: N.S. Debugger
description:
In N.S. Debugger, you play a human trapped in a machine dominated world, entering console commands to prove random numbers to an AI. 

Made in 2 days for the GMTK Game Jam, only using Godot 3.2.

This game is really, really hard and I haven't had a chance to fully balance it before the deadline, so here's a walkthrough if interested: Walkthrough (spoilers)
